00031 #ifndef PX_COLLISION_NXHEIGHTFIELDDESC
00032 #define PX_COLLISION_NXHEIGHTFIELDDESC
00033 
00037 #include "common/PxPhysXCommon.h"
00038 #include "geometry/PxHeightFieldFlag.h"
00039 #include "common/PxCoreUtilityTypes.h"
00040 
00041 #ifndef PX_DOXYGEN
00042 namespace physx
00043 {
00044 #endif
00045 
00054 class PxHeightFieldDesc
00055 {
00056 public:
00057 
00064     PxU32                           nbRows;
00065 
00072     PxU32                           nbColumns;
00073 
00083     PxHeightFieldFormat::Enum       format;
00084     
00103     PxStridedData                   samples;
00104 
00120     PxReal                  thickness;
00121 
00136     PxReal                  convexEdgeThreshold;
00137 
00145     PxHeightFieldFlags      flags;
00146 
00150     PX_INLINE               PxHeightFieldDesc();
00151 
00155     PX_INLINE       void    setToDefault();
00156 
00161     PX_INLINE       bool    isValid() const;
00162 };
00163 
00164 PX_INLINE PxHeightFieldDesc::PxHeightFieldDesc()    //constructor sets to default
00165 {
00166     nbColumns                   = 0;
00167     nbRows                      = 0;
00168     format                      = PxHeightFieldFormat::eS16_TM;
00169     thickness                   = -1.0f;
00170     convexEdgeThreshold         = 0.0f;
00171     flags                       = PxHeightFieldFlags();
00172 }
00173 
00174 PX_INLINE void PxHeightFieldDesc::setToDefault()
00175 {
00176     *this = PxHeightFieldDesc();
00177 }
00178 
00179 PX_INLINE bool PxHeightFieldDesc::isValid() const
00180 {
00181     if (nbColumns < 2) return false;
00182     if (nbRows < 2) return false;
00183     switch (format)
00184     {
00185     case PxHeightFieldFormat::eS16_TM:
00186         if (samples.stride < 4) return false;
00187         break;
00188     default:
00189         return false;
00190     }
00191     if (convexEdgeThreshold < 0) return false;
00192     if ((flags & PxHeightFieldFlag::eNO_BOUNDARY_EDGES) != flags) return false;
00193     return true;
00194 }
00195
